title: Max Chantal
text:
Max Chantal (born in <a href="Villeneuve-sur-Lot">Villeneuve-sur-Lot</a>, on 21 August 1955) is a French <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> player who represented <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a> in the <a href="1977%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">1977</a> and <a href="1985%E2%80%931988%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">1985–1988 Rugby League World Cup</a>s.
Personal life.
His son, Benoît Chantal was also a rugby league player for <a href="Villeneuve%20XIII%20RLLG">Villeneuve-sur-Lot</a>.
